  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>ILMoE</catalog>
            <entry>ILMoE1268</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Birkat Hamazon4</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Birkat Hamazon4</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Birkat Hamazon4</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Birkat Hamazon4</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Birkat Hamazon4</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Birkat Hamazon4</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Birkat Hamazon4</string>
          </title>
          <language>en</language>
          <description>
            <string language="en">In this lesson, learners will study Judaism’s sanctification of day-to-day material objects and actions, specifically the sanctification of eating that is reflected in Birkat Hamazon.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Birkat Hamazon</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">prayer</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">lookstein center</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">sanctification</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">In dieser Lektion studieren Anfänger Judaism?s 
sanctification der materiellen Alltagsnachrichten und Tätigkeiten, 
spezifisch das sanctification des Essens das wird in Birkat Hamazon 
reflektiert.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Dans cette leçon, les étudiants étudieront la 
sanctification de judaïsme des objets matériels de jour en jour et des 
actions, spécifiquement la sanctification de manger cela est reflétées 
dans Birkat Hamazon.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Nesta lição, os learners estudarão o 
sanctification de Judaism?s de objetos materiais cotidianos e as 
ações, o sanctification de comer isso são refletidas 
especificamente em Birkat Hamazon.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">In questa lezione, i principianti studeranno il 
sanctification di Judaism?s degli oggetti materiali giornalieri e le 
azioni, specificamente il sanctification di consumo del quello è 
riflessa in Birkat Hamazon.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Σε αυτό το μάθημα, οι αρχάριοι θα μελετήσουν την 
αγιοποίηση Judaism?s των καθημερινών υλικών αντικειμένων και 
τις ενέργειες, συγκεκριμένα η αγιοποίηση της κατανάλωσης που 
απεικονίζεται σε Birkat Hamazon.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">En esta lección, los principiantes estudiarán 
el sanctification de Judaism?s de objetos materiales cotidianos y las 
acciones, el sanctification de comer eso se reflejan específicamente 
en Birkat Hamazon.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Birkat Hamazon</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Gebet</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">lookstein Mitte</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">sanctification</string>
          </keyword>
